verses.verse: I am a <S%H2261>rose<s%> of <S%H8289>Sharon,<s%> a <S%H7799>lily<s%> of the <S%H6010>valleys.<s%> Lover
As a <S%H7799>lily<s%> among <S%H2336>thorns,<s%> so is my <S%H7474>love<s%> among the <S%H1323>daughters.<s%> Beloved

As the apple <S%H8598>tree<s%> among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3293>wood,<s%> so is my <S%H1730>beloved<s%> among the <S%H1121>sons.<s%> I <S%H3427>sat<s%> down under his <S%H6738>shadow<s%> with great <S%H2530>delight,<s%> his <S%H6529>fruit<s%> was <S%H4966>sweet<s%> to my <S%H2441>taste.<s%>
He <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H3196>banquet<s%> <S%H1004>hall.<s%> His <S%H1714>banner<s%> over me is <S%H160>love.<s%>
<S%H7502>Strengthen<s%> me with <S%H809>raisins,<s%> <S%H7502>refresh<s%> me with <S%H8598>apples;<s%> For I am <S%H2470>faint<s%> with <S%H160>love.<s%>
His left <S%H8040>hand<s%> is under my <S%H7218>head.<s%> His right <S%H3225>hand<s%> embraces <S%H2263>me.<s%>

I <S%H7650>adjure<s%> <S%H1323>you,<s%> daughters of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> by the <S%H6643>roes,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> by the <S%H355>hinds<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> that you not stir <S%H5782>up,<s%> nor <S%H5782>awaken<s%> <S%H160>love,<s%> until it so <S%H2654>desires.<s%>
The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H1730>beloved!<s%> <S%H935>Behold,<s%> he comes, <S%H1801>leaping<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> <S%H7092>skipping<s%> on the <S%H1389>hills.<s%>

My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is <S%H1819>like<s%> a <S%H6643>roe<s%> or a <S%H6082>young<s%> <S%H354>hart.<s%> <S%H5975>Behold,<s%> he stands <S%H310>behind<s%> our <S%H3796>wall!<s%> He <S%H7688>looks<s%> in at the <S%H2474>windows.<s%> He <S%H6692>glances<s%> through the <S%H2762>lattice.<s%>
My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> <S%H6030>spoke,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6965>me,<s%> "Rise up, my <S%H7474>love,<s%> my beautiful <S%H3303>one,<s%> and come <S%H3212>away.<s%>
<S%H5638>For,<s%> behold, the winter is <S%H5674>past.<s%> The <S%H1653>rain<s%> is <S%H2498>over<s%> and <S%H1980>gone.<s%>

The <S%H5339>flowers<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%> The <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H2158>singing<s%> has <S%H5060>come,<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H8449>turtledove<s%> is <S%H8085>heard<s%> in our <S%H776>land.<s%>

The fig <S%H8384>tree<s%> <S%H2590>ripens<s%> her green <S%H6291>figs.<s%> The <S%H1612>vines<s%> are in <S%H5563>blossom.<s%> They <S%H5414>give<s%> forth their <S%H7381>fragrance.<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> my <S%H7474>love,<s%> my beautiful <S%H3303>one,<s%> and come <S%H3212>away.<s%>" Lover

My <S%H3123>dove<s%> in the <S%H2288>clefts<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> In the <S%H5643>hiding<s%> <S%H4095>places<s%> of the <S%H7200>mountainside,<s%> Let me see your <S%H4758>face.<s%> Let me <S%H8085>hear<s%> your <S%H6963>voice;<s%> for your <S%H6963>voice<s%> is <S%H6156>sweet,<s%> and your <S%H4758>face<s%> is <S%H5000>lovely.<s%>

<S%H270>Catch<s%> for us the <S%H7776>foxes,<s%> the <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H7776>foxes<s%> that <S%H2254>spoil<s%> the <S%H3754>vineyards;<s%> for our <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> are in <S%H5563>blossom.<s%> Beloved
My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is <S%H7462>mine,<s%> and I am his. He browses among the <S%H7799>lilies.<s%>

Until the <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H6315>cool,<s%> and the <S%H6752>shadows<s%> flee <S%H5127>away,<s%> <S%H5437>turn,<s%> my <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> and be <S%H1819>like<s%> a <S%H6643>roe<s%> or a <S%H6082>young<s%> <S%H354>hart<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H1336>Bether.<s%>
